name: BALLING (EmInSpace)
description:
physics based ball platforming game.

you are a ball, and you are BALLING

tell me your time in the comments, mine was 1 minute and 20.47 seconds

The entirety of this game was made during a stream on twitch, and it took about 2 and a half hours to make

controls:

WASD or arrows to move

W, Up, or Space to jump
